verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3213>Howl<s%> ye, <S%H1929>Woe<s%> worth the <S%H3117>day!<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> even the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> a <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

And the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and great <S%H2479>pain<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> when the <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and they shall take <S%H3947>away<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and her <S%H3247>foundations<s%> shall be broken <S%H2040>down.<s%>

Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> and <S%H6316>Libya,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lydia,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the mingled <S%H6154>people,<s%> and <S%H3552>Chub,<s%> and the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> that is in <S%H1285>league,<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> They also that <S%H5564>uphold<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall;<s%> and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down:<s%> from the <S%H4480>tower<s%> <S%H4024><s%> of <S%H5482>Syene<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> in it by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And they shall be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and her <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H2717>wasted.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and when <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5826>helpers<s%> shall be <S%H7665>destroyed.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H4397>messengers<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me in <S%H6716>ships<s%> to <S%H853>make<s%> the <S%H983>careless<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H2729>afraid,<s%> and great <S%H2479>pain<s%> shall <S%H1961>come<s%> upon them, as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3588>for,<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> it <S%H935>cometh.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will also <S%H853>make<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> and they shall <S%H7324>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H2975>rivers<s%> <S%H2724>dry,<s%> and <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked:<s%> and I will make the land <S%H8074>waste,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and all that is <S%H4393>therein,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will also <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and I will cause their <S%H457>images<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of <S%H4480>Noph;<s%> <S%H5297><s%> and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H3374>fear<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And I will make Pathros <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6624><s%> and will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H6814>Zoan,<s%> and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H4996>No.<s%>

And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4996>No.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H5512>Sin<s%> shall have great <S%H2342>pain,<s%> <S%H2342><s%> and <S%H4996>No<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> rent <S%H1234>asunder,<s%> and <S%H5297>Noph<s%> shall have <S%H6862>distresses<s%> <S%H3119>daily.<s%>

The young <S%H970>men<s%> of <S%H205>Aven<s%> and of <S%H6364>Pi-beseth<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and <S%H2007>these<s%> cities shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

At <S%H8471>Tehaphnehes<s%> also the <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H2820>darkened,<s%> when I shall <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease<s%> in her: as for <S%H1931>her,<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> her, and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>
Thus will I <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, in the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be bound <S%H2280>up<s%> to be <S%H5414>healed,<s%> <S%H7499><s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2848>roller<s%> to <S%H2280>bind<s%> it, to make it <S%H2388>strong<s%> to <S%H8610>hold<s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and will <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2220>arms,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2389>strong,<s%> and that which was <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and I will <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> out of his <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>
And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

And I will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but I will <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H2220>arms,<s%> and he shall <S%H5008>groan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with the <S%H5009>groanings<s%> of a deadly <S%H2491>wounded<s%> man.

But I will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I shall <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall stretch it <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
